text.__SUMMARY__:
Fritillaria ussuriensis is an Asian species of herbaceous plant in the lily family, native to Korea, the Primorye Region of Russia, and northeastern China (Heilongjiang, Jilin, Liaoning).Fritillaria ussuriensis is a bulb-forming perennial up to 100 cm tall. Flowers are hanging, bell-shaped, brownish-purple with yellowish markings.
Varieties
